website_summaries.verdict: Silica supplement derived from oceanic red algae and available in vegetable capsule form.
pros: Free of: gluten, wheat, dairy, soy, yeast, sugar, and sodium
Capsules are also free of artificial flavors, sweeteners, preservatives, and colors
cons: Some buyers didn't notice any benefit from taking this product

customer_reviews.title: Best for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my hair falling out like crazy, for 1.5 year non stop.. Tried so many pills, bamboo extract, biotin, silica from Fiji water, no change until my beautician advised silica but by this particular brand only for great quality and absorption. She also told me about taking Ester C by solgar. I started taking both daily. 3 months later I noticed no hair in the shower drain. Could hardly believe Been taking for close to 10 months, got my mom in it too, she is noticing difference after 2 months. Gonna stick with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Changes your life. Stick with it.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap this stuff is amazing. My husband and I began taking these daily and within the week we could see the hairs on our arms growing in thicker....so we did before and after photos, 2 months go by and our hair has gotten to lush its insane! Nails so hard they're hard to clip....so not a bad thing. If you suffer from brittle hair, hair loss, skin issues, bone pain, or brittle nails, get this!! And stick with it. I also noticed within the month the pain I'd have in my knees or elbows after a days work wasnt there anymore...I'm 30 and I felt 20 years old after taking this for a month. Unreal stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for healthy, strong nails
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff works like nothing else. I try really hard to get all my vitamins from whole foods and on top of that, supplement with stuff for an additional hair/skin/nail boost like biotin, collagen, hyaluronic acid, etc. This Solgar oceanic silica is the only thing that has made a significant difference for me (supplement-wise). My nails grow really fast and strong after taking 2 capsules, 2x daily with meals for what seems like only a week, and somehow my nail beds look healthier too. I stopped for a while when I ran out to see how another hair/skin/nails supplement fared for me, and after coming back to this, have realized how effective/awesome it is. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product for over a year and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over a year and a half. I think it's a benefit for hair nails and skin. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Allen

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE TRACE MINERAL
customer_reviews.text: Silica supports bone health and the creation and maintenance of connective tissue. Silica gives positive effects on skin, hair, and nails by keeping these parts supple, strong, and prevents brittleness.

customer_reviews.title: Every Day!
customer_reviews.text: Using silica has vastly improved my cracked skin around my finger tips..... great stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Really improves nail growth.  I will reorder.
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped my nail growth. I've taken biotin and other silicas, keratin,bamboo extract; but no real improvement. This must be more absorbable, because my nails remind me of my youth. Much stronger. I take only one per day. I will definitely reorder. It's so nice to have prettier nails without resorting to artificials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have noticed a difference..
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels fuller, thicker, shinier, less frizzy and more manageable. I am really glad I tried this product and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Highlandsparrow

customer_reviews.title: Stopped hair shedding.
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for hair loss. I had tried saw palmetto and black currant oil, but my hair just kept falling out. I read about silica and decided to try it. I chose this brand due to the positive reviews. After three weeks, I noticed so much less shedding. I took it daily for another three weeks, and switched my dosage to only three times a week after that. It still works. I need to make it clear that this did not thicken my hair, but since it stopped the crazy shedding, it allowed the sparse parts of my head to recover.
customer_reviews.author: garagon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Really good price. I've been taking it for a couple months now and I've definitely noticed my hair is growing faster and is really healthy! My nails too. My skin has been nice, but that's probably a combination of my new skincare routine and the silica. Definitely recommend! But stick with it and take it every day to see results. Be patient! Of course the other benefits would be less noticeable but definitely appreciated (memory and bone health).
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Fatigue and Headaches
customer_reviews.text: This supplement made me extremely fatigued and gave me headaches, I never get headaches! I tested it out by taking it at different times of the day and also not taking any other supplements, same results each time.

Three weeks later my nails looked much improved. I also ordered 3 bottles to give to my friend who has thinning hair. I wanted to give her enough that she could give it a good trial. Don't know if this will help her with thicker hair, but am waiting with bated breath. I can definitly recommend this product to strengthen weak nails.

customer_reviews.title: Solgar Oceanic Silica
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Solgar Oceanic Silica from 3 vendors at Amazon, and I like this latest one the best because the others had more than twice the calcium that is in this purchase. It costs less too :). In general the oceanic silica has strengthened my fingernails better than any other product that I have tried, and I will use it as long as I am able to get it.

customer_reviews.title: This product is made from red algae not horsetail
customer_reviews.text: I do not have an opinion yet because I've only taken this one week and I've had an increase in migraines so I do not know if it's this product or not. I noticed to reviewers said that it caused them to have headaches. I'm writing this review because I noticed One reviewer said that this product is dangerous because it's made with horsetail and then went into detail about horsetail. However this supplement is made from red algae not horse tail like the majority of supplements. In other words silica is usually made from horse tail but this product is made from red algae.

I will update further after trying bamboo again.

customer_reviews.text: Great way of getting calcium for vegetarians and it makes the hair grow faster and more healthy. I have being using this product and sometimes the Solgar High Potency vegetarian Silica for years and I can definitely notice the difference when I don't use it for a long time. As a vegetarian who doesn't drink milk, this is a great way of getting enough calcium (and healthier than calcium coming from milk..)

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Brand Choice for Silica
customer_reviews.text: Personally, for my body needs and response, this Solgar silica works best. I've noticed the more popular silica brand, which I've used for years, has gradually reduced the capsule content. Capsules reduced to half full. I actually found these by Solgar through researching then muscle testing for my body. The Solgar Oceanic are my #1 choice. Better hair strength, nail strength and skin which are external evidences. I suspect the internal evidence is bone happiness & wellness.
customer_reviews.author: moi_Amy

product_meta.title: Solgar – Oceanic Silica 25 mg, 100 Vegetable Capsules
feature_bullets: RED ALGAE POWDER: Silica obtained from marine-derived Red Algae Powder (Lithothamnion corallioides) is a source of the natural trace element, Silicon
SOURCES OF SILICON: Silicon is found in some seafood sources, including mussels as well as in many unrefined grains
SILICON BENEFITS: The intake of the natural trace element Silicon has been positively associated with supporting bone health

KOSHER, GLUTEN FREE & SUITABLE FOR VEGANS: These vegetable capsules are KOF-K Kosher certified, non-GMO, suitable for vegans and are certified gluten free. They are free of: gluten, wheat, dairy, soy, yeast, sugar, and sodium. They are also free of artificial flavors, sweeteners, preservatives and colors
